label: Vue Guide
description: Your introduction to Vue. Providing getting started examples and use case examples, this is the place you want to go to get started.

label: Vue API
description: Done with the guide? Struggling to implement something? Refer to the Vue API documentation for clarification.

label: Official Vue Examples
description: Looking for more examples? There is a lot not covered in our example, why not check out the official Vue examples.

label: Vue CLI
description: Use the Vue CLI to spool up Vue templates in node.
